Posts.Content: I would like to get a 2nd pathologist to read my husbands biospy. What steps do I need to take to do this ? I really have no idea. We are in northern indiana , not sure if that makes a difference on where I can send them or if it is all computerized now. Thanks
Posts.Title: How to get a 2nd reading on a biopsy

Posts.Content: Thanks Mikla...that sounds way easier than I thought it would be.
Posts.Title: How to get a 2nd reading on a biopsy

Posts.Content: We just got the results back from John Hopkins on my husband slides and now we are even more confused. A-F) Benign Prostate Tissue G) Prostate Tissue with small focus of Atypical Glands , Suspicious for Carcinoma. (Although these findings are atypical and suspicious for adenocarcinoma, , there is insufficient cytologic and/or architectural atypia to establish a definite diagnosis. Repeat biopsy is recommended with relative increased sampling of the initial atypical site's. Stains for high molecular weight cytokeratin andP63 are positive in a patchy fashion in some of the glands. H) Benign Prostate Tissue I-K) HPIN L) Benign Prostatic Tissue Looks like hubby needs another biopsy. First path report had G at a Gleason 6 and H atypia
Posts.Title: Got 2nd opinion from John Hopkins

Posts.Title: Got 2nd opinion from John Hopkins

Posts.Content: Husband Age 56 PSA 5.61 (first one) DRE normal Prostate is a little enlarged..has been for at least 7 years.
Posts.Title: Got 2nd opinion from John Hopkins

Posts.Content: Husband Age 56 PSA 5.61 (first one) DRE normal Prostate is a little enlarged..has been for at least 7 years.
Posts.Title: Got 2nd opinion from John Hopkins

Posts.Content: G) Gleason 3+3 was 10% in the first report. I think they sent everything they had. They sent 38 slides. 3 of each but 4 of G & H. The first pathologist also stained G & H so they may be why there was an extra slide of those. Not sure about a 3rd opinion because I too think it would be hard to beat Hopkins. And we also had to pay on our own for the Hopkins because the Dr would not fill out the paper work..said it was not needed (the paper work ) Looking for a new Dr. I am hoping to is good news for husband and not just another biopsy...but ya got to be sure about this stuff.
